Function Documentation

void RTRString::grow (  unsigned int  n  )  [inherited]
 

Increase the capacity of this string to accomodate n bytes.
ENSURE : capacity() >= n

void RTRString::trim (  unsigned  int  )  [inherited]
 

Decrease the capacity of this string to accomodate n bytes.
ENSURE : capacity() <= n count() <= n

void RTRString::setCount (  unsigned int  i  )  [inherited]
 

Set count to i.
[Useful when using the string storage (via to_c()) as a buffer]
REQUIRE : i <= capacity()
